title: Mastodon - The Hunter Visualizer [Full Album Premiere]
description:
On September 20th, 2011 the progressive metal legends, Mastodon debuted their entire 2011 album, "The Hunter" on YouTube in the form of this incredible visualizer. 

I ripped this from the original stream in 720p and converted it using handbrake. I have searched and could not find this video anywhere else and am hoping some other Mastodon fans enjoy it as much as I do. 

Format                    : MPEG-4
File size                 : 1.75 GiB
Duration                  : 53mn 3s
Overall bit rate          : 4 718 Kbps
Width                     : 1 280 pixels
Height                    : 720 pixels
